string.value: It seems like #p2032001# in Orbis has some concerns...

As the Pixies turned ferocious recently, #p2032001# is worried about Oribis' future and asked me to drive away the Pixies and entrusted me with the Pixie's sculptures. But could it be because of the Pixie who is outside the door that we cannot go out? 

#t4000059# #b#c4000059##k / 10
#t4000060# #b#c4000060##k / 10
#t4000061# #b#c4000061##k / 10 

#o3230200# #r#a30971##k
#o4230106# #r#a30972##k
#o5120000# #r#a30973##
The Pixies were driven away and the sculptures were left aside and given to #p2032001# . #p2032001# researched on the sculptures and told me to look for him again.
Umm.. It's something serious...\n#L0##bWhat could it be that is so serious?#k#l

Did you see the Pixies outside? They are becoming ferocious day by day. Not long ago, my assistant and I were going out but we were chased by a Pixie and it almost got serious. We could not even step out of the house with this happening.\n#L0##bWith a situation like that, it was almost a serious matter.#k#l
We have to know why the Pixies became ferocious somehow.It seems like the Goddess who appeared in the cloud is related to this. Won't you listen to my request?

Good thinking. Now eliminate #b20 each of #o3230200#, #o4230106#, #o5120000##k, lay aside #b10 each of #t4000059#, #t4000060#, #t4000061##k immediately. We have to know what changes occurred to the sculpture that contains the Pixies' strength.
This is not just a simple problem of whether we can go out or not. Don't you even worry about the future of Orbis?
It has been hard on you. I am examining the Pixie's sculptures, so come again later.
When the tower of the Goddess appeared, the Pixies started to become ferocious. It is clear that they are somehow related!
When the tower of the Goddess appeared, the Pixies started to become ferocious. It is clear that they are somehow related!
